016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.multicast;
017
018import jakarta.inject.Inject;
019import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
020import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
021import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
022
023import javax.jmdns.JmDNS;
024import javax.jmdns.ServiceEvent;
025import javax.jmdns.ServiceListener;
026import javax.jmdns.ServiceTypeListener;
027import java.io.IOException;
028import java.util.ArrayList;
029import java.util.List;
030import java.util.Map;
031import java.util.Optional;
032import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
033
034@Service(name = "dns.multicast.discovery")
035public class DnsDiscoveryService
036        implements ServiceListener, ServiceTypeListener {
037
038    private final Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(getClass());
039    private final JmDNS jmdns;
040
041    private final Map<String, List<ServiceEvent>> services = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
042
043    @Inject
044    public DnsDiscoveryService(JmDNS jmDNS) throws IOException {
045        jmdns = jmDNS;
046        jmdns.addServiceTypeListener(this);
047    }
048
049    @Override
050    public void serviceAdded(ServiceEvent serviceEvent) {
051        logger.debug("Added service:" + serviceEvent.getName() + ":" + serviceEvent.getType() + ":" + serviceEvent.getInfo());
052        services.computeIfAbsent(serviceEvent.getType(), type -> new ArrayList<>()).add(serviceEvent);
053    }
054
055    @Override
056    public void serviceRemoved(ServiceEvent serviceEvent) {
057        logger.debug("Removed service:" + serviceEvent.getName() + ":" + serviceEvent.getType() + ":" + serviceEvent.getInfo());
058        Optional.ofNullable(services.get(serviceEvent.getType())).ifPresent(list ->
059        {
060            for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++) {
061                ServiceEvent event = list.get(i);
062                if (event.getName().equals(serviceEvent.getName())) {
063                    list.remove(i);
064                    return;
065                }
066            }
067        });
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    public void serviceResolved(ServiceEvent serviceEvent) {
072        logger.debug("Resolved service:" + serviceEvent.getName() + ":" + serviceEvent.getType() + ":" + serviceEvent.getInfo());
073    }
074
075    @Override
076    public void serviceTypeAdded(ServiceEvent event) {
077        logger.debug("Service type added:" + event.getType());
078        jmdns.addServiceListener(event.getType(), this);
079    }
080
081    @Override
082    public void subTypeForServiceTypeAdded(ServiceEvent event) {
083        logger.debug("Service sub type added:" + event.getType());
084        jmdns.addServiceListener(event.getType(), this);
085    }
086
087    public Map<String, List<ServiceEvent>> getServices() {
088        return services;
089    }
090}
